articles.description: XCOM: Chimera Squad isn’t your normal kinda XCOM experience, and while in some ways (reduced scale, smaller missions) that’s a bummer, in other ways—namely the new “Breach” system—it has been an absolute pleasure to play.
articles.content:

articles.title: Google Stadia Review (2020 Update) - IGN
articles.description: Since its launch, Google Stadia has gradually added missing features and expanded its catalog. With a free Base version now available, we checked back in on ...
articles.content:
Since its launch, Google Stadia has gradually added missing features and expanded its catalog. With a free Base version now available, we checked back in on Google's game streaming service to see how it stacks up against the competition.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Facebook open-sources Blender, a chatbot people say ‘feels more human’ - VentureBeat
articles.description: Facebook's open source Blender chatbot framework achieved state-of-the-art results compared with Google's latest Meena model.
articles.content: Facebook AI Research (FAIR), Facebooks AI and machine learning division, today detailed work on a comprehensive AI chatbot framework called Blender. FAIR claims that Blender, which is available in open source on GitHub, is the largest-ever open-domain chatbot… [+1190 chars]

articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Canon now lets you use its cameras as a webcam with amazing video quality - The Verge
articles.description: Canon has released a new, downloadable tool that lets you use its recent digital cameras as a webcam for Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and other apps. The results compared to a PC’s built-in webcam will blow you away.
articles.content:
The quality of your Zoom will blow everyone elses away
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
Interested in improving the video quality of your own Zoom frame tenfold? If youve got a recent Canon mirrorless, DSLR, or PowerShot camera, you can now use i… [+1860 chars]

articles.title: Streets of Rage 4 Review - IGN
articles.description: Streets of Rage 4 delivers a fun, traditional experience but prioritises nostalgia over any kind of modern reinvention. Reviewed by Dale Driver on PlayStatio...
articles.content: Streets of Rage 4 delivers a fun, traditional experience but prioritises nostalgia over any kind of modern reinvention. Reviewed by Dale Driver on PlayStation 4. Also available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and PC.
